subtests.name: Constructing a CSSPerspective with a keyword other than none (string) throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a keyword other than none (CSSKeywordValue) throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a double throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a unitless zero throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a string length throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a number CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a time dimension CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Constructing a CSSPerspective with a CSSMathValue of angle type throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a keyword other than none (string) throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a keyword other than none (CSSKeywordValue) throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a double throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a unitless zero throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a string length throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a number CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a time dimension CSSUnitValue throws a TypeError
Updating CSSPerspective.length with a CSSMathValue of angle type throws a TypeError
CSSPerspective can be constructed from a length CSSUnitValue
CSSPerspective.length can be updated to a length CSSUnitValue
CSSPerspective can be constructed from a CSSMathValue of length type
CSSPerspective.length can be updated to a CSSMathValue of length type
CSSPerspective can be constructed from none (CSSKeywordValue)
CSSPerspective.length can be updated to none (CSSKeywordValue)
CSSPerspective can be constructed from none (string)
CSSPerspective.length can be updated to none (string)
Modifying CSSPerspective.is2D is a no-op
